items.sentence: I don\'t know what that word means, but I\'ll try to find out.
Tom wasn\'t the only one who didn\'t know how to speak French.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom didn\'t know I was going to be here.
Do you think you could help me weed the garden this afternoon?
It seems to me that you should be able to do that by yourself.
I never thought that it\'d be this hard to create an iPad app.
After eating three dishes of ice cream, Tom had a stomachache.
Tom didn\'t seem to care that Mary wasn\'t having a good time.
That might not be as difficult as you think it\'s going to be.
Tom reached into his pocket and pulled out a handful of coins.
